[Month VI2, (the 1st of which was identical with) the 30th (of the preceding month) ... first part of the night, Jupi]ter was 3 cubits below β Librae. Night of the 2nd, the moon was 1 1/2 cubits behind β Librae [...]

[... cub]its, the moon being 1 cubit high to the north. The 10th, equinox; I did not watch. Night of the 14th, [moonrise to sunset:] 8°.
